cards.name: Accursed Centaur
cards.text: When Accursed Centaur enters the battlefield, sacrifice a creature.
cards.flavor:
"The Cabal mocks the natural order. For its minions, death is just a pause between duties."
—Kamahl, druid acolyte

cards.name: Æther Charge
cards.text: Whenever a Beast enters the battlefield under your control, you may have it deal 4 damage to target opponent.
cards.flavor: "Is it just me, or does that meteor have teeth?"

cards.name: Aggravated Assault
cards.text: {3}{R}{R}: Untap all creatures you control. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

cards.name: Airborne Aid
cards.text: Draw a card for each Bird on the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
"We help our Southern Order comrades as much as we can. But the Cabal's insidious influence spreads, dividing our forces and leaving new arrivals to fend for themselves."
—Commander Eesha

cards.name: Airdrop Condor
cards.text:
Flying
{1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin creature: Airdrop Condor deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: It has two kinds of droppings, neither of which is particularly pleasant.

cards.name: Akroma's Blessing
cards.text:
Choose a color. Creatures you control gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.
Cycling {W} ({W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: The clerics saw her as a divine gift. She saw them only as allies in her war against Phage.

cards.name: Akroma's Vengeance
cards.text:
Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.
Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: Ixidor had only to imagine their ruin and Akroma made it so.

cards.name: Ancestor's Prophet
cards.text: Tap five untapped Clerics you control: You gain 10 life.
cards.flavor: "We have faced horrors of war and terrors beyond imagining. We will overcome the uncertainties of this new life."

cards.name: Animal Magnetism
cards.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent chooses a creature card from among them. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest into your graveyard.

cards.name: Annex
cards.text:
Enchant land (Target a land as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that land.)
You control enchanted land.
cards.flavor: Most refugees left their ancestral homes behind when they came to Otaria. A few decided to bring them along.

cards.name: Anurid Murkdiver
cards.text: Swampwalk
cards.flavor: Aphetto's swamps are alive with the dead.

cards.name: Aphetto Alchemist
cards.text:
{T}: Untap target artifact or creature.
Morph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: He brews trouble.

cards.name: Aphetto Dredging
cards.text: Return up to three target creature cards of the creature type of your choice from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: Phage became both executioner and savior, helping others to the same rebirth she had found.

cards.name: Aphetto Grifter
cards.text: Tap two untapped Wizards you control: Tap target permanent.
cards.flavor: Aphetto con artists started working in pairs to make it less likely they'd be the victims of con artists.

cards.name: Aphetto Vulture
cards.text:
Flying
When Aphetto Vulture dies, you may put target Zombie card from your graveyard on top of your library.

cards.name: Arcanis the Omnipotent
cards.text:
{T}: Draw three cards.
{2}{U}{U}: Return Arcanis the Omnipotent to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: He has journeyed where none have been before. Now he returns to ensure that none follow.

cards.name: Artificial Evolution
cards.text: Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one creature type with another. The new creature type can't be Wall. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

cards.name: Ascending Aven
cards.text:
Flying
Ascending Aven can block only creatures with flying.
Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Astral Slide
cards.text: Whenever a player cycles a card, you may exile target creature. If you do, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.flavor:
"The hum of the universe is never off-key."
—Mystic elder

cards.name: Aura Extraction
cards.text:
Put target enchantment on top of its owner's library.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: Every day, Order clerics contain as much of the Mirari's energy as possible, hoping to delay Otaria's demise.

cards.name: Aurification
cards.text:
Whenever a creature deals damage to you, put a gold counter on it.
Each creature with a gold counter on it is a Wall in addition to its other creature types and has defender. (Those creatures can't attack.)
When Aurification leaves the battlefield, remove all gold counters from all creatures.

cards.name: Avarax
cards.text:
Haste
When Avarax enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a card named Avarax, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
{1}{R}: Avarax gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Aven Brigadier
cards.text:
Flying
Other Bird creatures get +1/+1.
Other Soldier creatures get +1/+1.
cards.flavor: He represents what little pride the Order has left.

cards.name: Aven Fateshaper
cards.text:
Flying
When Aven Fateshaper enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
{4}{U}: Look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

cards.name: Aven Soulgazer
cards.text:
Flying
{2}{W}: Look at target face-down creature.
cards.flavor: "Every question has a proper answer. Every soul has a proper place."

cards.name: Backslide
cards.text:
Turn target creature with morph face down.
Cycling {U} ({U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: Some things are better left unknown.

cards.name: Barkhide Mauler
cards.text: Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: Anywhere else they would be hunted for their skins, but in Wirewood, they are safe.

cards.name: Barren Moor
cards.text:
Barren Moor enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Battering Craghorn
cards.text:
First strike
Morph {1}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: Their skeletons can be found all over Skirk Ridge, tangled in each other's horns.

cards.name: Battlefield Medic
cards.text: {T}: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn, where X is the number of Clerics on the battlefield.
cards.flavor: "Death never stops to rest. Neither can we."

cards.name: Biorhythm
cards.text: Each player's life total becomes the number of creatures he or she controls.
cards.flavor:
"I have seen life's purpose, and now it is my own."
—Kamahl, druid acolyte

cards.name: Birchlore Rangers
cards.text:
Tap two untapped Elves you control: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
Morph {G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Blackmail
cards.text: Target player reveals three cards from his or her hand and you choose one of them. That player discards that card.
cards.flavor: Even the most virtuous person is only one secret away from being owned by the Cabal.

cards.name: Blatant Thievery
cards.text: For each opponent, gain control of target permanent that player controls. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
cards.flavor: "I'll leave subtlety to the rich."

cards.name: Blistering Firecat
cards.text:
Trample, haste
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Blistering Firecat.
Morph {R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Bloodline Shaman
cards.text: {T}: Choose a creature type. Reveal the top card of your library. If that card is a creature card of the chosen type, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.
cards.flavor: Every creature of the forest has a name, and she knows them all.

cards.name: Bloodstained Mire
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Bloodstained Mire: Search your library for a Swamp or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Boneknitter
cards.text:
{1}{B}: Regenerate target Zombie.
Morph {2}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: Nothing comes together as easily as it comes apart.

cards.name: Break Open
cards.text: Turn target face-down creature an opponent controls face up.
cards.flavor: There are two ways to resolve puzzling situations: thoughtful contemplation or force. After thoughtful contemplation, most barbarians choose force.

cards.name: Brightstone Ritual
cards.text: Add {R} to your mana pool for each Goblin on the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Wizards fought over the stone to exploit its power. Goblins fight over it because it's shiny.

cards.name: Broodhatch Nantuko
cards.text:
Whenever Broodhatch Nantuko is dealt damage, you may put that many 1/1 green Insect creature tokens onto the battlefield.
Morph {2}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Butcher Orgg
cards.text: You may assign Butcher Orgg's combat damage divided as you choose among defending player and/or any number of creatures he or she controls.
cards.flavor: It can kill you with three arms tied behind its back.

cards.name: Cabal Archon
cards.text: {B}, Sacrifice a Cleric: Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
cards.flavor: "You are weak. I am strong. The protocol is obvious."

cards.name: Cabal Executioner
cards.text:
Whenever Cabal Executioner deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices a creature.
Morph {3}{B}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Cabal Slaver
cards.text: Whenever a Goblin deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.
cards.flavor: "In its natural habitat, the goblin is stupid, yet devious. Now it's stupid, devious, and powerful."

cards.name: Callous Oppressor
cards.text:
You may choose not to untap Callous Oppressor during your untap step.
As Callous Oppressor enters the battlefield, an opponent chooses a creature type.
{T}: Gain control of target creature that isn't of the chosen type for as long as Callous Oppressor remains tapped.

cards.name: Catapult Master
cards.text: Tap five untapped Soldiers you control: Exile target creature.
cards.flavor: "There's no ‘I' in ‘team,' but there's a ‘we' in ‘weapon.'"

cards.name: Catapult Squad
cards.text: Tap two untapped Soldiers you control: Catapult Squad deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
cards.flavor: Together they could hit anything between the heavens and the horizon.

cards.name: Centaur Glade
cards.text: {2}{G}{G}: Put a 3/3 green Centaur creature token onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: The Mirari called to the centaurs, and all who heard it were forever changed.

cards.name: Chain of Acid
cards.text: Destroy target noncreature permanent. Then that permanent's controller may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

cards.name: Chain of Plasma
cards.text: Chain of Plasma deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Then that player or that creature's controller may discard a card. If the player does, he or she may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

cards.name: Chain of Silence
cards.text: Prevent all damage target creature would deal this turn. That creature's controller may sacrifice a land. If the player does, he or she may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

cards.name: Chain of Smog
cards.text: Target player discards two cards. That player may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

cards.name: Chain of Vapor
cards.text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Then that permanent's controller may sacrifice a land. If the player does, he or she may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

cards.name: Charging Slateback
cards.text:
Charging Slateback can't block.
Morph {4}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: Goblins prize its hide for building rock sled runners.

cards.name: Choking Tethers
cards.text:
Tap up to four target creatures.
Cycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Choking Tethers, you may tap target creature.

cards.text:
As Circle of Solace enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
{1}{W}: The next time a creature of the chosen type would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

cards.name: Clone
cards.text: You may have Clone enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

cards.name: Commando Raid
cards.text: Until end of turn, target creature you control gains "When this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature that player controls."

cards.name: Complicate
cards.text:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
Cycling {2}{U} ({2}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Complicate, you may counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

cards.name: Contested Cliffs
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{R}{G}, {T}: Target Beast creature you control fights target creature an opponent controls. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

cards.name: Convalescent Care
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 5 or less life, you gain 3 life and draw a card.
cards.flavor: Enlightenment comes most swiftly at life's end.

cards.name: Cover of Darkness
cards.text:
As Cover of Darkness enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creatures of the chosen type have fear. (They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

cards.name: Crafty Pathmage
cards.text: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.
cards.flavor: The most valuable commodity in the pits is a way out.

cards.name: Crowd Favorites
cards.text:
{3}{W}: Tap target creature.
{3}{W}: Crowd Favorites gets +0/+5 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"The rabble likes them. Make sure they win, then book them for tomorrow."
—Cabal Patriarch

cards.name: Crown of Ascension
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.
Sacrifice Crown of Ascension: Enchanted creature and other creatures that share a creature type with it gain flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "Wisdom, clear my eyes."

cards.name: Crown of Awe
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has protection from black and from red.
Sacrifice Crown of Awe: Enchanted creature and other creatures that share a creature type with it gain protection from black and from red until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "Honor, guide my step."

cards.name: Crown of Fury
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has first strike.
Sacrifice Crown of Fury: Enchanted creature and other creatures that share a creature type with it get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "Passion, fire my heart."

cards.name: Crown of Suspicion
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/-1.
Sacrifice Crown of Suspicion: Enchanted creature and other creatures that share a creature type with it get +2/-1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "Darkness, hide my fear."

cards.name: Crown of Vigor
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
Sacrifice Crown of Vigor: Enchanted creature and other creatures that share a creature type with it get +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "Life, be my shield."

cards.name: Crude Rampart
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Morph {4}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: Success is one part inspiration, nine parts desperation.

cards.name: Cruel Revival
cards.text: Destroy target non-Zombie creature. It can't be regenerated. Return up to one target Zombie card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: Few Cabal fighters fear death. They fear what follows it.

cards.name: Cryptic Gateway
cards.text: Tap two untapped creatures you control: You may put a creature card from your hand that shares a creature type with each creature tapped this way onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Its lock changes to fit each key.

cards.name: Custody Battle
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, target opponent gains control of this creature unless you sacrifice a land."
cards.flavor: Goblins resolve disputes by splitting everything straight down the middle.

cards.name: Daru Cavalier
cards.text:
First strike
When Daru Cavalier enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a card named Daru Cavalier, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

cards.name: Daru Encampment
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{W}, {T}: Target Soldier creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Daru Healer
cards.text:
{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
Morph {W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Daru Lancer
cards.text:
First strike
Morph {2}{W}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: Although the Order frowned upon his preparations for the pits, behind closed doors most saw the fights as a necessary evil.

cards.name: Daunting Defender
cards.text: If a source would deal damage to a Cleric creature you control, prevent 1 of that damage.
cards.flavor: "I will wield the stone of my homeland as though it were the fists of the Ancestor."

cards.name: Dawning Purist
cards.text:
Whenever Dawning Purist deals combat damage to a player, you may destroy target enchantment that player controls.
Morph {1}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Death Match
cards.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, that creature's controller may have target creature of his or her choice get -3/-3 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The Cabal breeds many things for the pit fights, but it never breeds compassion.

cards.name: Death Pulse
cards.text:
Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
Cycling {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Death Pulse, you may have target creature get -1/-1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Defensive Maneuvers
cards.text: Creatures of the creature type of your choice get +0/+4 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "Only on the battlefield can we repay all the Order has given us."

cards.name: Demystify
cards.text: Destroy target enchantment.
cards.flavor: "The truth will outshine all lies."

cards.name: Dirge of Dread
cards.text:
All creatures gain fear until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Cycling {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Disciple of Grace
cards.text:
Protection from black
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: Dread was as foreign to her as the landscape ahead.

cards.name: Disciple of Malice
cards.text:
Protection from white
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: The lantern he carried did not light his way—it signaled his approach.

cards.name: Discombobulate
cards.text: Counter target spell. Look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
cards.flavor:
"I said ‘pick his brain,' not ‘tear off his head.'"
—Riptide Project researcher

cards.name: Dispersing Orb
cards.text: {3}{U}, Sacrifice a permanent: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor:
"Like the seas, the Æther is fickle and ever-changing. If we can control one, we can master the other."
—Riptide Project director

cards.name: Disruptive Pitmage
cards.text:
{T}: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
Morph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: "Show weakness to hide your strength."

cards.name: Dive Bomber
cards.text:
Flying
{T}, Sacrifice Dive Bomber: Dive Bomber deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
cards.flavor: "Your graves will lie beneath my final nest."

cards.name: Doom Cannon
cards.text:
As Doom Cannon enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
{3}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature of the chosen type: Doom Cannon deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Doomed Necromancer
cards.text: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice Doomed Necromancer: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
"His sacrifice shall not be forgotten. Now toss his body over there with the others."
—Phage the Untouchable

cards.name: Doubtless One
cards.text:
Doubtless One's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Clerics on the battlefield.
Whenever Doubtless One deals damage, you gain that much life.
cards.flavor: "Share your devotion with me."

cards.name: Dragon Roost
cards.text: {5}{R}{R}: Put a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
cards.flavor: A powerful mage created the roost to guard a portal between the planes. The mage is long gone, but dragons still keep watch at the gate.

cards.name: Dream Chisel
cards.text: Face-down creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
cards.flavor: Itself a product of Ixidor's tortured psyche, the chisel brings his darkest dreams to life.

cards.name: Dwarven Blastminer
cards.text:
{2}{R}, {T}: Destroy target nonbasic land.
Morph {R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: "Life is too short for something like a hunk of rock to get in my way."

cards.name: Ebonblade Reaper
cards.text:
Whenever Ebonblade Reaper attacks, you lose half your life, rounded up.
Whenever Ebonblade Reaper deals combat damage to a player, that player loses half his or her life, rounded up.
Morph {3}{B}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Elven Riders
cards.text: Elven Riders can't be blocked except by Walls and/or creatures with flying.
cards.flavor: "Wirewood cannot hide great size. Only with speed and skill can we survive here."

cards.name: Elvish Guidance
cards.text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds {G} to his or her mana pool for each Elf on the battlefield (in addition to the mana the land produces).
cards.flavor: "Old home never forgotten, new home ours forever."

cards.name: Elvish Pathcutter
cards.text: {2}{G}: Target Elf creature gains forestwalk until end of turn.
cards.flavor: In harsh times, the strongest currency is cooperation.

cards.name: Elvish Pioneer
cards.text: When Elvish Pioneer enters the battlefield, you may put a basic land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
cards.flavor:
"Destruction is the work of an afternoon. Creation is the work of a lifetime."
—Kamahl, druid acolyte

cards.name: Elvish Scrapper
cards.text: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Elvish Scrapper: Destroy target artifact.
cards.flavor: "The stories tell of a distant time when machines overran the forests, destroying everything that lived. That time will not come again."

cards.name: Elvish Vanguard
cards.text: Whenever another Elf enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Elvish Vanguard.
cards.flavor: "Our lives are woven together like the trees' branches over our heads, forming a canopy that protects us all."

cards.name: Elvish Warrior
cards.flavor: "My tales of war are the stories most asked for around the fires at night, but they're the ones I care least to tell."

cards.name: Embermage Goblin
cards.text:
When Embermage Goblin enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a card named Embermage Goblin, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
{T}: Embermage Goblin deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Enchantress's Presence
cards.text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, draw a card.
cards.flavor: "The wise learn from successes as well as mistakes."

cards.name: Endemic Plague
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Endemic Plague, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy all creatures that share a creature type with the sacrificed creature. They can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Entrails Feaster
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile a creature card from a graveyard. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Entrails Feaster. If you don't, tap Entrails Feaster.

cards.name: Essence Fracture
cards.text:
Return two target creatures to their owners' hands.
Cycling {2}{U} ({2}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor:
"Shaping reality is simply a matter of knowing where to apply pressure."
—Ixidor, reality sculptor

cards.name: Everglove Courier
cards.text:
You may choose not to untap Everglove Courier during your untap step.
{2}{G}, {T}: Target Elf creature gets +2/+2 and has trample for as long as Everglove Courier remains tapped.

cards.name: Exalted Angel
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Exalted Angel deals damage, you gain that much life.
Morph {2}{W}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Explosive Vegetation
cards.text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: Torching Krosa would be pointless. It grows faster than it burns.

cards.name: Fade from Memory
cards.text:
Exile target card from a graveyard.
Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: Proper burial is a luxury Otarians can no longer afford.

cards.name: Fallen Cleric
cards.text:
Protection from Clerics
Morph {4}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: The most terrifying zombies are those with just a hint of their old selves left.

cards.name: False Cure
cards.text: Until end of turn, whenever a player gains life, that player loses 2 life for each 1 life he or she gained.
cards.flavor:
"I do unto others as others have done unto me."
—Phage the Untouchable

cards.name: Feeding Frenzy

cards.flavor: It wasn't as much a strategy as a dim instinct to drown their prey.

cards.name: Festering Goblin
cards.text: When Festering Goblin dies, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

"My vengeance will drown my enemies as my storms drown the desert."
—Ixidor, reality sculptor

cards.name: Searing Flesh
cards.text: Searing Flesh deals 7 damage to target opponent.
cards.flavor: Zemoo found out the hard way that "inflammable" and "flammable" mean the same thing.

cards.name: Seaside Haven
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{W}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice a Bird: Draw a card.

cards.name: Secluded Steppe
cards.text:
Secluded Steppe enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.
Cycling {W} ({W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Serpentine Basilisk
cards.text:
Whenever Serpentine Basilisk deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
Morph {1}{G}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Severed Legion
cards.text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
cards.flavor: No one in Aphetto answers a knock at the door after sundown.

cards.name: Shade's Breath
cards.text: Until end of turn, each creature you control becomes a black Shade and gains "{B}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn."
cards.flavor: The grim business of the Coliseum casts long shadows.

cards.name: Shaleskin Bruiser
cards.text:
Trample
Whenever Shaleskin Bruiser attacks, it gets +3/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Beast.
cards.flavor: Its only predators are the elements.

cards.name: Shared Triumph
cards.text:
As Shared Triumph enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creatures of the chosen type get +1/+1.
cards.flavor: "Win together, die alone."

cards.name: Shepherd of Rot
cards.text: {T}: Each player loses 1 life for each Zombie on the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
"My priests swore loyalty to the Cabal not until death, but beyond it."
—Cabal Patriarch

cards.name: Shieldmage Elder
cards.text:
Tap two untapped Clerics you control: Prevent all damage target creature would deal this turn.
Tap two untapped Wizards you control: Prevent all damage target spell would deal this turn.
cards.flavor: "You may fight if I deem your cause worthy."

cards.name: Shock
cards.text: Shock deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor:
"I love lightning It's my best invention since the rock."
—Toggo, goblin weaponsmith

cards.name: Sigil of the New Dawn
cards.text: Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}{W}. If you do, return that card to your hand.
cards.flavor:
"We lay our dead to rest in a beautiful bed, in hopes that the Ancestor will think it a fit cradle for the next life."
—Mystic elder

cards.name: Silent Specter
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Silent Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player discards two cards.
Morph {3}{B}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Silklash Spider
cards.text:
Reach
{X}{G}{G}: Silklash Spider deals X damage to each creature with flying.
cards.flavor: The only thing that flies over the Krosan Forest is the wind.

cards.name: Silvos, Rogue Elemental
cards.text:
Trample
{G}: Regenerate Silvos, Rogue Elemental.
cards.flavor: He was born of the Mirari, thrust out of his homeland before he was even aware. Left without purpose or meaning, he found both in the pits.

cards.name: Skirk Commando
cards.text:
Whenever Skirk Commando deals combat damage to a player, you may have it deal 2 damage to target creature that player controls.
Morph {2}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Skirk Fire Marshal
cards.text:
Protection from red
Tap five untapped Goblins you control: Skirk Fire Marshal deals 10 damage to each creature and each player.
cards.flavor: He's boss because he's smart enough to get out of the way.

cards.name: Skirk Prospector
cards.text: Sacrifice a Goblin: Add {R} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"I like goblins. They make funny little popping sounds when they die."
—Braids, dementia summoner

cards.name: Skittish Valesk
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, turn Skittish Valesk face down.
Morph {5}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Slate of Ancestry
cards.text: {4}, {T}, Discard your hand: Draw a card for each creature you control.
cards.flavor: The pattern of life can be studied like a book, if you know how to read it.

cards.name: Slice and Dice
cards.text:
Slice and Dice deals 4 damage to each creature.
Cycling {2}{R} ({2}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Slice and Dice, you may have it deal 1 damage to each creature.

cards.name: Slipstream Eel
cards.text:
Slipstream Eel can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
Cycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: "It's a fine way to travel, if you don't mind the smell."

cards.name: Smother
cards.text: Destroy target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less. It can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor:
"I can't hear them scream, but at least I don't have to listen to them beg."
—Phage the Untouchable

cards.name: Snapping Thragg
cards.text:
Whenever Snapping Thragg deals combat damage to a player, you may have it deal 3 damage to target creature that player controls.
Morph {4}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Snarling Undorak
cards.text:
{2}{G}: Target Beast creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Morph {1}{G}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: Most creatures in the Krosan Forest feared the Mirari's power. A few fed upon it.

cards.name: Solar Blast
cards.text:
Solar Blast deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
Cycling {1}{R}{R} ({1}{R}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Solar Blast, you may have it deal 1 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Soulless One
cards.text: Soulless One's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Zombies on the battlefield plus the number of Zombie cards in all graveyards.
cards.flavor: "Surrender your soul to me."

cards.name: Sparksmith
cards.text: {T}: Sparksmith deals X damage to target creature and X damage to you, where X is the number of Goblins on the battlefield.
cards.flavor: "If it didn't hurt, how would I know it worked?"

cards.name: Spined Basher
cards.text: Morph {2}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor:
"How cute. Does it do any other tricks?"
—Braids, dementia summoner

cards.name: Spitfire Handler
cards.text:
Spitfire Handler can't block creatures with power greater than Spitfire Handler's power.
{R}: Spitfire Handler gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "Wait 'til Toggo sees this"

cards.name: Spitting Gourna
cards.text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Morph {4}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Spurred Wolverine
cards.text: Tap two untapped Beasts you control: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
cards.flavor: After a few painful experiences, goblins learned not to pick their noses around the beasts.

cards.name: Spy Network
cards.text: Look at target player's hand, the top card of that player's library, and any face-down creatures he or she controls. Look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

cards.name: Stag Beetle
cards.text: Stag Beetle enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of other creatures on the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Its voice crackles with the hum of a thousand wings beating at once.

cards.name: Standardize
cards.text: Choose a creature type other than Wall. Each creature becomes that type until end of turn.
cards.flavor: At that point, the wizards' argument got a lot uglier.

cards.name: Starlit Sanctum
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{W}, {T}, Sacrifice a Cleric creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness.
{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a Cleric creature: Target player loses life equal to the sacrificed creature's power.

cards.name: Starstorm
cards.text:
Starstorm deals X damage to each creature.
Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: Pardic barbarians didn't complain when the Order started blaming every crisis on the Cabal.

cards.name: Steely Resolve
cards.text:
As Steely Resolve enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creatures of the chosen type have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)
cards.flavor: No one in Wirewood understands what is happening. They just know it's unnatural—and coming from Krosa.

cards.name: Strongarm Tactics
cards.text: Each player discards a card. Then each player who didn't discard a creature card this way loses 4 life.
cards.flavor: "If you can't pay your gambling debts, you just might be tomorrow's main attraction at the Grand Coliseum."

cards.name: Sunfire Balm
cards.text:
Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
Cycling {1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Sunfire Balm, you may prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

cards.name: Supreme Inquisitor
cards.text: Tap five untapped Wizards you control: Search target player's library for up to five cards and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
cards.flavor: "It's hard to fight on an empty mind."

cards.name: Swat
cards.text:
Destroy target creature with power 2 or less.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: Few who cross Phage have the chance to repeat the mistake.

cards.name: Symbiotic Beast
cards.text: When Symbiotic Beast dies, put four 1/1 green Insect creature tokens onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: The insects found a meal in the carrion of the beast's prey. The beast found a spiffy new hairstyle.

cards.name: Symbiotic Elf
cards.text: When Symbiotic Elf dies, put two 1/1 green Insect creature tokens onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: The elves arriving in Wirewood had no homes, let alone weapons, but they knew that the forest would always provide.

cards.name: Symbiotic Wurm
cards.text: When Symbiotic Wurm dies, put seven 1/1 green Insect creature tokens onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: The insects keep the wurm's hide free from parasites. In return, the wurm doesn't eat the insects.

cards.name: Syphon Mind
cards.text: Each other player discards a card. You draw a card for each card discarded this way.
cards.flavor: When tempers run high, it's easy to lose your head.

cards.name: Syphon Soul
cards.text: Syphon Soul deals 2 damage to each other player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
cards.flavor: As Phage drank their energy, a vague memory of Jeska stirred. Then she lost herself again in the joy of her victims' suffering.

cards.name: Taunting Elf
cards.text: All creatures able to block Taunting Elf do so.
cards.flavor: The safety of the village depends on the beast thinking with its stomach.

cards.name: Tempting Wurm
cards.text: When Tempting Wurm enters the battlefield, each opponent may put any number of artifact, creature, enchantment, and/or land cards from his or her hand onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Tephraderm
cards.text:
Whenever a creature deals damage to Tephraderm, Tephraderm deals that much damage to that creature.
Whenever a spell deals damage to Tephraderm, Tephraderm deals that much damage to that spell's controller.

cards.name: Thoughtbound Primoc
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, if a player controls more Wizards than each other player, the player who controls the most Wizards gains control of Thoughtbound Primoc.
cards.flavor: Efforts to use them as spies failed when they kept reporting to the enemy.

cards.name: Thrashing Mudspawn
cards.text:
Whenever Thrashing Mudspawn is dealt damage, you lose that much life.
Morph {1}{B}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: It just obeys you. It doesn't like you.

cards.name: Threaten
cards.text: Untap target creature and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
cards.flavor: Goblins' motivational techniques are crude, but effective.

cards.name: Thunder of Hooves
cards.text: Thunder of Hooves deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player, where X is the number of Beasts on the battlefield.

cards.name: Towering Baloth
cards.text: Morph {6}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: The Mirari twisted all that lived in the Krosan Forest into gross mockeries of their former selves.

cards.name: Trade Secrets

cards.name: Tranquil Thicket
cards.text:
Tranquil Thicket enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
Cycling {G} ({G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Treespring Lorian
cards.text: Morph {5}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: No matter your strength, the Krosan Forest is stronger. No matter your speed, the Wirewood Forest is faster.

cards.name: Tribal Golem
cards.text: Tribal Golem has trample as long as you control a Beast, haste as long as you control a Goblin, first strike as long as you control a Soldier, flying as long as you control a Wizard, and "{B}: Regenerate Tribal Golem" as long as you control a Zombie.

cards.name: Tribal Unity
cards.text: Creatures of the creature type of your choice get +X/+X until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Kamahl left the violence of his former life behind him, but he still believes in the power of muscle.

cards.name: Trickery Charm
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
• Target creature becomes the creature type of your choice until end of turn.
• Look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

cards.name: True Believer
cards.text: You have shroud. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
cards.flavor: So great is his certainty that mere facts cannot shake it.

cards.name: Undead Gladiator
cards.text:
{1}{B}, Discard a card: Return Undead Gladiator from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
Cycling {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Unholy Grotto
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{B}, {T}: Put target Zombie card from your graveyard on top of your library.

cards.name: Unified Strike
cards.text: Exile target attacking creature if its power is less than or equal to the number of Soldiers on the battlefield.
cards.flavor: The tall, reedy grass of the Daru Plains rustles loudly in the winds, a perfect cover for any ambush.

cards.name: Venomspout Brackus
cards.text:
{1}{G}, {T}: Venomspout Brackus deals 5 damage to target attacking or blocking creature with flying.
Morph {3}{G}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Visara the Dreadful
cards.text:
Flying
{T}: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor: "My eyes are my strongest feature."

cards.name: Vitality Charm
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Put a 1/1 green Insect creature token onto the battlefield.
• Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
• Regenerate target Beast.

cards.name: Voice of the Woods
cards.text: Tap five untapped Elves you control: Put a 7/7 green Elemental creature token with trample onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: The ritual of making draws upon the elves' memories and pasts. And elves have long memories and ancient pasts.

cards.name: Voidmage Prodigy
cards.text:
{U}{U}, Sacrifice a Wizard: Counter target spell.
Morph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Walking Desecration
cards.text: {B}, {T}: Creatures of the creature type of your choice attack this turn if able.
cards.flavor: Such sacrilege turns blinding grief into blinding rage.

cards.name: Wall of Mulch
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{G}, Sacrifice a Wall: Draw a card.
cards.flavor: Mulch is the fabric of life in the forest. Plants live in it, they die in it, and then they become part of it, feeding countless generations to come.

cards.name: Wave of Indifference
cards.text: X target creatures can't block this turn.
cards.flavor:
"Darius?"
"Yeah?"
"There's a goblin sneaking up on you."
"So?"
"Just sayin'."

cards.name: Weathered Wayfarer
cards.text: {W}, {T}: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Activate this ability only if an opponent controls more lands than you.

cards.name: Weird Harvest
cards.text: Each player may search his or her library for up to X creature cards, reveal those cards, and put them into his or her hand. Then each player who searched his or her library this way shuffles it.
cards.flavor: Krosa's distorted groves bear strange fruit.

cards.name: Wellwisher
cards.text: {T}: You gain 1 life for each Elf on the battlefield.
cards.flavor: "Close your ears to the voice of greed, and you can turn a gift for one into a gift for many."

cards.name: Wheel and Deal
cards.text:
Any number of target opponents each discards his or her hand, then draws seven cards.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Whipcorder
cards.text:
{W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
Morph {W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: His bolas whirl like galaxies, but it's his enemies who see stars.

cards.name: Windswept Heath
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Windswept Heath: Search your library for a Forest or Plains card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Wirewood Elf
cards.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: "The land belongs to nature as far as our eyes can see. The higher we climb, the more we can see."

cards.name: Wirewood Herald
cards.text: When Wirewood Herald dies, you may search your library for an Elf card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: The goblins laughed as the elf ran away, until more came back.

cards.name: Wirewood Lodge
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{G}, {T}: Untap target Elf.

cards.name: Wirewood Pride
cards.text: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.
cards.flavor: "Though you may leave this haven we have found, may our strength never leave you."

cards.name: Wirewood Savage
cards.text: Whenever a Beast enters the battlefield, you may draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"She is truly Wirewood's child now."
—Elvish refugee

cards.name: Withering Hex
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever a player cycles a card, put a plague counter on Withering Hex.
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 for each plague counter on Withering Hex.

cards.name: Wooded Foothills
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Wooded Foothills: Search your library for a Mountain or Forest card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Words of War
cards.text: {1}: The next time you would draw a card this turn, Words of War deals 2 damage to target creature or player instead.
cards.flavor:
"Passions can't be shackled by laws or mastered with logic. The choice is freedom or death."
—Volume IV, The Book of Fire

cards.name: Words of Waste
cards.text: {1}: The next time you would draw a card this turn, each opponent discards a card instead.
cards.flavor:
"Terror corrupts order and paralyzes instinct."
—Volume III, The Book of Decay

cards.name: Words of Wilding
cards.text: {1}: The next time you would draw a card this turn, put a 2/2 green Bear creature token onto the battlefield instead.
cards.flavor:
"Instinct is undaunted by terror, unchained by logic. It is the path from which all other paths diverge."
—Volume V, The Book of Life

cards.name: Words of Wind
cards.text: {1}: The next time you would draw a card this turn, each player returns a permanent he or she controls to its owner's hand instead.
cards.flavor:
"Be logical in all things. Do not allow instinct or passion to cloud your mind."
—Volume II, The Book of Insight

cards.name: Words of Worship
cards.text: {1}: The next time you would draw a card this turn, you gain 5 life instead.
cards.flavor:
"The faithful don't succumb to terror, nor are they ruled by passion. They adhere to order, for order is life."
—Volume I, The Book of Faith

cards.name: Wretched Anurid
cards.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you lose 1 life.
cards.flavor: The only prince inside this frog is the one it ate.
